lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.question: Why was Stephen arrested by the Jewish leaders?
answers: They didn’t like what he was saying about Jesus
He healed a man on the Sabbath

questions.question: What did Stephen say to the leaders?
answers: They had killed Jesus, the promised Messiah
I was wrong about Jesus – he isn't the Messiah

questions.question: What did Stephen see when he looked up to heaven?
answers: God in heaven, with Jesus standing next to Him
The temple shining in the sky

questions.question: What did the Jewish leaders do to Stephen?
answers: Killed him by throwing stones at him
Sent him to prison for life

questions.question: Why did the believers scatter?
answers: They were being arrested and thrown into prison
They wanted to travel the world

questions.question: What did an angel tell Philip to do?
Who did Philip meet along the road?
answers: An Ethiopian man who served the queen

questions.question: What was the Ethiopian man reading?
Who did Philip say Isaiah was writing about?
What happened after Philip baptized the man?
answers: The Holy Spirit carried Philip away to another place
They traveled back to Jerusalem together
The queen came to meet Philip
